hey ammir... to play it you need to go to 
My Documents\ACTIVISION\Transformers.. open pcconfig.txt!! then edit the settings like this
FileVersion                    1
ScreenWidth                    800
ScreenHeight                   600
ScreenRefreshRate              60
FSAA                           0
Widescreen                     3
SFXVolume                      10
MusicVolume                    10
MouseSensitivity               0
InvertY                        0
Vibration                      0
BloomMethod                    1
DesiredBloomMethod             1
BloomEnabled                   0
ShadowMethod                   1
DesiredShadowMethod            1
ShadowsEnabled                 0
SpeedBlurSupported             0
SpeedBlurEnabled               1
TransformersUseHires           0
TransformersUseHiresPending    0
